items.text: bit more on the off stump, still a bit full, and he pushes it down to long on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.preText:
Shakib around the wicket to the left-hander

Dilip: "That wicket and shot by Shahzad was the result of his poor fitness and his inability to run ones and twos regularly. So passion is ok but at international level u cant compromise with your fitness."
items.text: on length on off, he defends it back
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: bit more on the off side, punched down to long off for one
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: angled in towards the stumps, hardly any room but he tucks it to leg for one
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

items.text: on middle and leg, flicked to midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: slower and shorter on the leg side, it's wide, and Shahidi goes down on a knee to sweep it fine of short fine leg for two
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 2 runs

items.text: quicker one and going across the stumps, he cuts and misses that one. Beaten by the change of pace
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.preText: Looks like Mehidy was going to continue but Mashrafe has decided to bring on Mosaddek now
items.text: lot of flight for this one on leg, turned away towards midwicket
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

items.text: much quicker on the off stump, punched down towards mid-off where cover runs across and stops it
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: he tries to go straighter with a drive and the bowler cuts it off this time
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: edged to the keeper? Liton celebrates but looks like there was nothing on it after he went on the back foot to cut and missed. No review taken. Surely there was a sound but maybe of bat hitting pad or the ground. Replays show it was actually ball hitting the pad on its way
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: much wider outside off and he drives it in the gap in the covers for one
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: leans forward towards the length ball and finds cover
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Asghar Afghan, no run

items.text: bit too full around off and it's helped down to long on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: flighted generously outside off, driven with the turn to long off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

items.text: turned to midwicket off the pads with the turn for one more
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: takes a small step down and blocks this back
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Asghar Afghan, no run

items.text: shorter and going across with the angle, Asghar helps it along fine on the leg side and gets two. Nice, deft touch
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Asghar Afghan, 2 runs

items.text: solid defence outside the off stump for that length ball to end the over
items.postText: NITESH PALIWAL: "This is very calm and smart inning build up by Afghanistan. They know their Bowling power and any score above 200+ may be threatening for Bangladesh."
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Asghar Afghan, no run

items.text: not much room outside off, he waits and cuts it straight to backward point
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: thought the keeper's legs and that's four! Lots of flight and room outside off, the batsman went for a big drive and missed it completely before the ball stayed low and went through the keeper
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 4 byes

items.text: pitched up and it's driven with the turn to deep cover
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: pitches it on the off stump line and he defends it back
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Asghar Afghan, no run

items.text: bit more towards middle and he takes off as soon as he helps it to midwicket for a quick single
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

items.text: quicker one to end the over, Shahidi goes back and pulls it along the ground for two quick runs
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 2 runs
